about_the_game:
* This patch is only intended for those of 18 years of age or older. It contains explicit sexual imagery that is unsuitable for minors or the workplace. All characters depicted well over the age of 18.

Play Signed and Sealed With a Kiss with a set of additional sexy image variations with this DLC pack!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC adds explicit, uncensored male genitalia to some of the game's illustrations, including pierced genitalia, condoms, and sperm.
